source.cbf18536:
# level - beginner, intermediate or advanced?
course_summaries[0].select("div small")[3].get_text() #WRONG
source.9e1f4e16:
names = []
schools = []
skills = []
summaries = []

for course in course_summaries:
    
    #course
    name = course.select_one("div h2").get_text()
    names.append(name)
    
    
    #school
    school = course.select_one("div h3").get_text()
    schools.append(school)
    
    #skills covered
    try:
        skills_covered = course.select("section p")[0].get_text()
    except:
        skills_covered = ''
    
    skills.append(skills_covered)
    
    #course summary
    summary = course.select_one("div p").get_text() 
    summaries.append(summary)
source.3884b464:
summary_dict = {
    'Course Name':names,
    'School':schools,
    'Skills Covered':skills,
    'Course Summary':summaries
}

df = pd.DataFrame(summary_dict)
df
